voice_agent.name: OPTKAS Capital Markets AI Concierge
voice_agent.description: ElevenLabs Conversational AI agent for the OPTKAS 877-570-XRPL investor relations line

elevenlabs.first_message: Thank you for calling OPTKAS Capital Markets. This is the investor relations desk. How may I assist you today?

inbound: 5. ElevenLabs matches +18775709775 → OPTKAS Capital Markets agent
6. AI agent answers with investor relations greeting
7. Full conversational AI handles the call
outbound: 1. ElevenLabs initiates call via agent dashboard
2. SIP INVITE sent to sip.telnyx.com with digest auth
3. Telnyx places the outbound call from +18775709775
4. AI agent starts conversation when recipient answers

agent_capabilities.investment_inquiries: Collects name, firm, email; explains $10M tranche of $500M program
agent_capabilities.due_diligence: Directs to data room portal, offers NDA-gated access
agent_capabilities.technical_questions: Explains XRPL settlement, 5-layer architecture, token structure
agent_capabilities.media_press: Takes contact info, routes to communications team
agent_capabilities.existing_investors: Confirms identity, offers relationship manager connection
agent_capabilities.compliance: Rule 144A / Reg S disclaimer included, not investment advice
